title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the justification

g ″ ( −1 )= e f( −1 ) [ ( f ′ ( −1 ) ) 2 + f ″ ( −1 ) ]

e f ( − 1 )   >   0  and f ' ( − 1 ) = 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@480F@

Since f' is decreasing on a neighborhood of -1, f''(-1) < 0. Therefore, g''(-1)<0.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the justification

g''( −1 )= e f( −1 ) [ ( f'( −1 ) )2+f''( −1 ) ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@50D5@

e f( −1 )  > 0 andf'( −1 )=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@480F@

Since f' is decreasing on a neighborhood of -1, f''(-1) < 0. Therefore, g''(-1)<0.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the justification

e f( −1 )  > 0 andf'( −1 )=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@480F@

Since f' is decreasing on a neighborhood of -1, f''(-1) < 0. Therefore, g''(-1)<0.

1 point is earned for the justification
